name: Samantha Green
climateImpactFact: Uses a bicycle instead of a car for daily commute, reducing emissions significantly.

name: Daniel Woods
climateImpactFact: Installed solar panels on his roof and powers his home with 100% renewable energy.

name: Leila Ahmad
climateImpactFact: Organized local clean-up events that removed over 1 ton of plastic waste from parks and rivers.

name: Jorge Mendes
climateImpactFact: Advocates for plant-based diets and helped convert his office cafeteria to a meatless Monday program.

name: Emily Zhang
climateImpactFact: Created a local app that connects people to share rides and reduce car usage in her community.
